about_the_game:
The heroic icon of English ballads clashes with the forces of the nefarious Sheriff of Nottingham in Robin Hood: Sherwood Defenders! Engage in raid defenses as you fend off wave after wave of incoming enemies both by placing structures and having Robin himself leap into the thick of the fight! 

The Defense 

Set up a variety of defenses to prepare in advance of the enemy fighters' arrival. Towers, walls, traps, and gates all provide nasty surprises for those who would seek to fuel the Sheriff's greed.

Hire additional soldiers to man the stronghold you create and help defeat the invaders before they take out its central structure! 

The Economy 

However, you'll need resources of your own if you're to withstand the growing onslaught, so don't forget to place production buildings alongside fortifications and then balance them to prevail.

With the right resource income, you'll be able to afford upgrades to your current buildings and make them more effective in their purpose.

The Fight

Robin Hood takes charge of defending the homes of his most loyal allies in the fight against the Sheriff but he can also put his legendary archery and swordsmanship skills to use in the fights.

As a wave of hostile soldiers appears, stand side-by-side with the other brave defenders! The different unit types among your allies and enemies have their strengths and weaknesses, so make the right choices!

The Rewards

As you succeed in battles, you make yourself ready to move on to a new area and unlock rewards in the form of new buildings, new defenses, new warriors, and even new arrows for Robin to use in the fight!

content_descriptors.notes: The game depicts battles in a medieval setting, where human characters are killed with various weapons.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: HDD required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-12100 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required

short_description: As the legendary Robin Hood, fight the Sheriff's forces in the open field by defending the Merry Men's allies from invasions in this tower defense game. Produce resources, build up your fortifications, place units, and then join in the battle yourself!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
